name: Lucky's Bubbles
description:
NOTE: SET TO FULL SCREEN

Meet Lucky: your average lucky black cat. He can make move using "A" and "D" and jump using "W". He can also shoot bubbles when you hit space. Bubbles can make Lucky fly for 2 seconds before popping, however, each bubble costs him one of his 9 lives. He can also shoot bubbles at his enemies, the Jack-O-Lanterns to make them fly for two seconds but BEWARE! Moving Jack-O-Lanterns are immune to bubbles. At the end of each level, Lucky refills on his bubble liquid and gets his 9 lives back.
